summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates a wide range of advanced machine‑learning training and inference capabilities, including checkpoint handling, cross‑validation, distributed execution, early stopping, gradient accumulation, state restoration, local SGD, multi‑process metric aggregation, model parallelism examples, profiling, schedule‑free optimization, and experiment tracking.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and robustness of sophisticated ML workflow features so that developers can rely on stable checkpointing, distributed training/inference, performance monitoring, and reproducible experiment management in production environments.
